title: @RIOT When does the Mystery Snowball end?
body:
Hey guys,
I've traded some skins with a friend for the Mystery Snowball, so I was just wondering what time tomorrow (8/1) that the Mystery Snowball ended. Will it be 18:59 AEDT like when the Snowdown Skins disappear? Or is it some other time?
Thanks,
og1764

replies.body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/theres-time-one-last-snowball

I believe it ends January 8, 18:59 AEDT
